Args.summary: The class that stores information about the MessageReceived event.

EndPoint.value: Gets or sets the remote endpoint that stores IP of the connected client.

Message.value: Gets or sets the message received from the connected client.

State.summary: The State class presents the state object that is used for thread synchronization.

Socket.value: Get or sets the socket that has accepted incoming connection.

BufferSize.value: Get or sets the size of the buffer for the incoming messages.

Buffer.value: Get or sets the array of type byte to store the incoming messages.

StringBuilder.value: Get or sets the String Builder to compose the incoming message.

Constructor.summary: Initializes a new instance of the State class with the default parameters.
Constructor.param: The size of the buffer for the incoming messages.
